channel.title: PNPT on Hi, I'm Rob.
channel.description: Recent content in PNPT on Hi, I'm Rob.

item.title: I passed the PNPT!
item.description: I am happy to share that I recently passed the Practical Network Penetration Tester certification exam on November 6! The Exam According to TCM’s website: The PNPT certification exam is a one-of-a-kind ethical hacking certification exam that assesses a studentâ€™s ability to perform an external and internal network penetration test at a professional level. Students will have five (5) full days to complete the assessment and an additional two (2) days to write a professional report.
